sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-CAG-FLEX-Archon1-KGC-EGFP-ER2 was a gift from Edward Boyden (Addgene plasmid # 108422 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:108422 ; RRID:Addgene_108422) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 108422) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 108422-AAV5)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: A robotic multidimensional directed evolution approach applied to fluorescent voltage reporters. Piatkevich KD, Jung EE, Straub C, Linghu C, Park D, Suk HJ, Hochbaum DR, Goodwin D, Pnevmatikakis E, Pak N, Kawashima T, Yang CT, Rhoades JL, Shemesh O, Asano S, Yoon YG, Freifeld L, Saulnier JL, Riegler C, Engert F, Hughes T, Drobizhev M, Szabo B, Ahrens MB, Flavell SW, Sabatini BL, Boyden ES. Nat Chem Biol. 2018 Feb 26. pii: 10.1038/s41589-018-0004-9. doi: 10.1038/s41589-018-0004-9. 10.1038/s41589-018-0004-9 PubMed 29483642
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:storage: Store at -80℃. Thaw just before use and keep on ice.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: AAV production plasmid encoding for Archon1 fluorescent voltage reporter, Cre-dependent expression.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EXFP-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: For distinguishing EGFP variants, reverse primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: EXFP-R

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Rabbit beta-globin intron, for pCAG plasmids, forward primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pCAG-F

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pCAGGS-5

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pCAGGS-5
WPRE
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: woodchuck hepatitis virus posttranscriptional regulatory element
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: WPRE

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.
